Package statistics

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorrelationRatio
    The correlation ratio is a measure of the relationship between the statistical dispersion within individual categories and the dispersion across the whole population or sample.
    CovarianceFinder
    Calculator for feature covariances.
    FeatureVariances
    A class for calculating and representing feature variances.
    HigherMoments
    Calculates the moments of the distribution.
    Variance2D
    This class represents 2D data variance so that Ellipses can be drawn to visualize dispersion in 2D.
